content.detailedDescription: I was in the sand an outa the corner of my eye i saw an object that was glowing bright orang red with a glowing tail behind the deriection it was moving it was makeing a noise that i have never heard  moved at speeds that were not human when i saw it i new exactly what it was  it came from the north of the island coming towred us bouncing up and down rapidly in  the heat from it was intense as it approtched the shot out over the wate a dencent beneth the water an shot out an a ridiculous speed till it looked like a star then as it was it glowed brither an dimed for about ten minutes
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At beach with friends appeard out of nowhere 4 other witnesses bright light landed in water and shot back up towards the sky

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from grocery shopping and turned south.  saw the same type lights from a couple years ago. blue skies. didn't take further because the guy who gave a follow up call was obviously hammered or mentally retarded.  disappointed with the call (he left a message). no need to respond with this bs
content.summary: You have on record ...Me with the same sighting at night with my wife from a couple years ago

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigarette on my front porch which faces north and immediately noticed a bright light relatively low-mid on the horizon, that was flickering dramatically many different colors, mainly seemed to be red, blue, white, yellow/orange.  at first i thought it was the star sirius, but was intrigued by it's abnormal seeming brightness and flickering, so i just kept staring at it, standing perfectly still. it was still for a few minutes then started to move to the right very slowly, it was barely noticeable at first, but i was using the tree as guidance and could see that it seemed to be moving. then all of a sudden it went dark, at that point i thought maybe it had been a plane that i was perhaps seeing from behind and that it had just gone off into the distance and was no longer in sight, although that didn't seem to make sense to me.  as i was thinking that the light reappeared in the same spot i last saw it at, still flickering and changing brightness, randomly going dark and then bright again. it moved straight to the right again rather quickly then went dark again, when it reappeared it was to the left of where i had last seen it before it moved to the right quickly. then it went dark again and seemed to be moving to the right again but the trees started to obscure my vision. i wanted to go walk down the street and get a better look, get a better angle, but i had my baby asleep inside sleeping and didn't want to leave him unattended. i stayed out for a few more minutes trying to see it, and either it disappeared or it moved to where i couldn't see it behind the trees/buildings.  i thought maybe it could've been a helicopter, but the brightness/colors of the light and the randomness of the flashing, plus it's odd movements do not comply with my understanding of how one would move. i also stood there and waited in those few minutes to see if a plane or helicopter would come out the other side, passed the trees, in line with where it seemed to be on the horizon, but saw nothing besides a couple other random airplanes that were in the area, but not where i had seen the ufo. so basically it looked very similar to sirius, but brighter with lots of flickering and movement.
content.summary: Very bright, randomly flickering light of many different colors, very similar looking to the star sirius, but would change brightness and would go completely dark. stationary and odd movments.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my 10th floor apartment building,there are lots of large windows and a sliding glass door,my apartment faces west and i can see as far out as toronto on a clear night,i was sitting texting on my phone and happened to look up and saw a green blob shooting up really fast in the sky then i ran to the window,i saw it break into three close together blobs in a horizontal line formation,it was solid green blobs of light,i then went onto balcony,neighbours and peple on street were yelling its a ufo and pointing.It flew very high far far above trees into night sky,then sideways in both directions,it was flitting around aimlessly,then it hovered and slowly began to descend into a field and dissapeared behind tree line,and then it was gone,afterwards cars went down that way really quick to check it out i suppose and the hellicopter is still flying around,it came after it happened,if it was a prank it was an amazingly well executed one,the picture i got is very poor and doesn't do the awe inspiring thing i saw justice but it all happened so fast ,i only caught its descent,i was about 2 football fields away and the sky was almost clear,weirdest thing i have ever seen!I wish i knew what i saw
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 green lights flying violently in sky then hovering and slowly descending finally into field downtown oshawa

content.detailedDescription: I used to work for the us navy,worked as a contractor for raytheon.At a relocatable over the horizon radar system sight. on my way,for a 12 hour shift,0600 to 1800.Saw a shadow flying from se going nw.Cloudless sky.It was black,i guess, no lights,no color that i tell. but it did have a delta, maybe boomerang shape, no sound either.It really stood out against the night sky.It kinda gave me a feeling of euphoria and light headedness.Though,i did not notice at the time,i apperently should have stopped and taken detailed notes.It was about 0440hr.I traveled this route,seven days a week,every two weeks, i worked one week on, one week off. it emitted no sound,no lights,it did have a particular shape.Pretty strange..Well, about 35 to 50 seconds after it flew over,there two uh-60's. that were flying, chasing after it.I noticed that they had some markings, were flying with absolutely no navigational lighting.Inside the cockpits they were probably using nvg equipment. they were definetly military.One of them did slow down for a couple seconds,to do a visual on me and my car.
content.summary: On my way to work south of alice,texas, i worked for raytheon,usn

content.detailedDescription: I took out my dogs for their business in the back yard. i looked up as there was no clouds to see the stars when i see a bright light pulsating changing different colors. i took out my binoculars and saw the object changing colors from red to yellow to blue to white. the brightness was sharp. no noise, but seemed to be moving in a straight line/same path moving west. i then see a white ufo at the 1 o'clock position flying away very slow with no lights then i see another ufo at the 12 o'clock position flying toward the lights. during this time i saw several airplanes that were making their decent to midway airport and notice a plane with flashing red lights, but was very high in the sky. i called my father and my niece's fianc�� which he saw what i was looking at. my father didn't see it due to having only vision in one eye. one thing, my mother was on a landline and her called dropped.
content.summary: Lights and 2 white ufo's going and coming

content.detailedDescription: While in the desert between nogales and douglas on the border on the mexican side, a friend and i were resting on a plato before climbing down the adjacent cliff. i saw what appeared to be a double star but they moved and grew larger as they approached. i became very scared not nowing what it could be and was in a precarious situation. the objects became multi-colored (every color of the rainbow) but the outline was basically white. they went from double star in space to what i descibed in about 4 minutes. they hovered over a large cravass approx., 400' deep. something strange occured in that i ran toward them rather than away to try and escape. my heart i recall was beating out of my chest so to speak and was odd i think that i ran in that direction. it probably took several minutes for me to get to the edge of the large cravass but when i got there i witnessed both objects disappate into solid rock. i wasn't aware but my friend was next to me and did the same as i. we didn't discuss this until breakfgast the next morning and never again after that. i have been hearing a lot on t.V., of sightings but have not heard any accounts of what i call light people moving through solid matter. i thought you would be interested in this testimony. i have not discussed this but with my wife of 40years and would gladly provide further information if necessary but would not want to have our lives changed in any way due to this encounter. this is something that happened to me years ago and she was not part of that time.  kind regards and i hope this helps-- david beard
content.summary: In 1973 my friend and i witnessed two elongted light objects (multi-colored desend from what looked like double stars, hovered and dissipated into solid rock

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside and heard my dog whine.  i looked up and heard then saw the object fly directly over me extremely fast.  it was being chased by 3 black helicopters. the object was very agile and could do 90 degree turns without slowing.  

within a few days, 2 black sedans came into my fathers gas station, each with 2 men dressed in black suits and sunglasses.  they got fuel from us as we were the only service station that took government credit cards.  the cards did not show the agencies name but was an official government credit card.  

they questioned my father for a few minutes asking about where certain places were located outside of town, and what was the easiest way to get to them.
content.summary: I heard then saw the object fly directly over me while in my yard

content.detailedDescription: Always look at sunset on horizon,and see all kinds of vapor trails but this one takes the cake. i know that it's just another weather balloon, but it's sure is cool? thought i seen a light that seemed not move all other objects were moving with the wind direction clouds, airplane emissions. not this stayed still for a good 2-3 minutes then looked farther to my right witch is going north and got a chance to see this thing split apart. a part of it sets out on what looks to be a abrupt angle for a jetliner if it was them people were in for a ride.
content.summary: Thought it was a vapor trail, until it did tricks.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Prior to this event witnessed psychic energy and unusual happenings, including afterward.  believed i was having hallucinations, wen't for help.  then i noticed many people with the same psychological affect.  scared of the woods.  while back had dream of waking up in woods prior to seeing a bright light coming through my window.  believed this to be dissociative delusion, perhaps a nightmare.  schizophrenia perhaps. 

this all (probably not physically related) led up to driving down the road on a hot summer day seeing a really bright object flying by over the soccer fields in simsbury.  at first believed it to be a passenger jet, though looking back it was really bright.  perhaps it gave off radiation i am not sure.  went back to look later nothing unusual.  haven't seen it since. could not figure out what this was. sounds like a lie, though i believe other people were in the area.  maybe they saw it too and will read this later and support this statement.  

afterward felt intense heat and paranoia, like having my mind read by a machine. said events occurred (not-exact) between 1996 - 2006 (maybe earlier)?  researched the phenomena psychological and abnormal - even paranormal ; could not figure out what this was all about.  do recall strange factoring out and trucks after moving.  

new living quarters were all "scary" after these events.  felt like i was in the center of attention - perhaps a pentagram of madness.  starting hiding out and it seems to have stopped.  still have not been able to figure out what it was.  took out books and still does not make sense. been ridiculed, i believe somehow relative to these happenings.  perhaps a hex of some sort i do not know.  i realize it sounds imagined, though i believe something opened up, passed through.  very careful now as well as "scared of the woods."  

some of the times in said report are off due to reporting these thoughts some years later.
content.summary: Driving saw bright "airplane" looking.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen ufo before in the past, but tonight was very strange , i saw well over 7 ufos traveling north at a very fast speed at very high altitude , all i can say is this was amazing for me to see , something is going on guys,i did video record this occasion but far to high to get on video
content.summary: Over 7 different sightings , most heading north , all in the space of 15 minutes , never seen so many sightings in short space of time

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my bed with my laptop when suddenly i heard a low flying helicopter. this is common in the area and i often like to check out helicopters or planes flying low. so, i stepped outside on my porch, listened for the sound of the helicopter coming from the southeast. i waited for 5 seconds before seeing a blacked-out helicopter with a red light on its tail and a strobe light on its nose. my first thought was: "seems strange that it looks as if it's trying to be incognito"
then i looked at an orange light that was in front of the helicopter. i immediately stepped into my driveway to take a better look. in front of that orange light was another orange light only more faint. the two orange lights were moving at the same speed and direction heading northwest. 
i watched this for 4 to 6 seconds and the whole time i was stumped on what it could be. i see aircraft fly by day and night around here all my life and can detect planes and helicopters real quick, but these orange lights really baffled me. for the duration of the sighting i felt like the helicopter was escorting something or following it closely. 
after 6 seconds i lost sight of both the 2 orange lights and helicopter as they dipped behind a tree line. once it did that, i instantly ran back inside and explained to my mother what i just had seen. i couldn't stop thinking of what it might have been, and i would keep looking out the door at the night sky. so, i drew a picture of what i saw right away. i'm willing to show this picture as well.
i trust mufon can shed some explanation to this or the possibilities of what it might be. i just want to know what it was i saw. and very strangely enough was there was no sound coming from these lights at all. there was only the sound of the helicopter. these lights never flashed or anything. they just moved straight toward the northwest at a constant speed.
content.summary: Black helicopter follows 2 orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on rt.107 from seabrook to kensington,nh about 11 pm and came to rt.150 and turned right at stop sign and noticed bright light overhead and stopped and observed lg. square/rectangle shape moving across sky. it was bright orange with red and blue "highlights" sort of bands of energy coming off square, it was moving at seemed moderate speed going s/sw and making no sound at all and within 3-5 seconds was over tree line and i looked to see if anyone else around and no one seen
content.summary: Orange box/rectangle moving s/sw across rt.150 in kensington,nh

content.detailedDescription:
Being recently widowed i've busied myself by clearing a sight-line from my front window to an ancient garage on my property and playing with a nikon d3100 camera i just bought. 
at around 10:15 on april 17, 2014 i tried to photograph the garage from inside the house ��� but the ancient, somewhat dirty glass made the pics less than ideal so i went outside on the porch to take them from a similar angle.
it then occurred to me that a photo of the garage in the streetlight might be cool so i moved over a bit to get a better angle. i took one pic and moved the camera very slightly to center the garage door better and took another.
i came inside to copy those pics to my computer when i noticed the odd glowing orb(s) and the fact that it(they) seemed to move a distance of some 40' at about a foot or so off the ground through some rather heavy privet undergrowth in just 18 seconds. i didn't actually see the light(s) at the time i took the pics as i was concentrating on the ���live view��� on the camera monitor for composition.
today, april 18, i took a couple of daylight closeups of the areas the light was seen: dsc_0277 and 278. there didn't seem to be any residual evidence, though.
i intend to keep a better eye on the area around my house in the future ��� with the camera readily available!
content.summary: A glowing orb moved some 40' out of the undergrowth in 18 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: It was a sunny, bright, cloudless morning as i walked outside my (then) home to get a feel of the workings of my new camera when i caught something above me in my peripheral vision.  i first thought it was a white butterfly or balloon.  after a few seconds i eliminated those possibilities as the flight, speed and course direction was invariant.  the object was bright white in color, and round in shape. i watched as it flew and as it stopped abruptly beside another similar object in the sky that was stationary.  the second object may have been moving before i saw it, i didn't notice it until the first object i was following with my eyes stopped beside it.  after a few seconds both objects quickly flew in opposite directions.  i thought it was odd that they did not seem to need to gain speed as one does in an airplane. they seemingly began flying as if they'd not stopped.  i then focused on the second object as it was flying in a direction that i wouldn't have an obstructed view.  i lost sight of that second object when i was distracted by a third object the second object flew near.  this object was round in shape like the first two, but was much higher in the sky and appeared to be much bigger, brighter, and more of a silver 'mirror' type of color rather than white.  it's shape was round, but it seemed to be changing form/shape as it ''drifted' downward. i didn't think at the time that it was drifting laterally, just descending slowly toward the earth/ground.  it began to reveal a 'snake-like' tail.  as it descended it appeared to be getting bigger, brighter, and began developing a longer and longer tail (double tail) as it's shape continued to change. as i watched it drift and morph in shape.  i then saw a fourth object fly across and under it.  this fourth object was smaller, flying at a much higher rate of speed and was farther away than the first two. i looked back to try and focus on the larger drifting object when i noticed a similar 'tail' in the shape of the letter 'c' .  my thought was that there was going to be an object to which it would be attached, but i didn't see one.  i squinted my eyes and noticed two more of these flying objects which were flying in opposite directions of each other.  i lost sight of all of the flying objects for different reasons, my attention diverted time after time by the number of objects, obstruction of objects due to trees, the objects getting to far away to maintain focus, and finally, the brightness of the mid-morning sky.  i tried to snap pictures, but, my camera was new and i did not have a good grasp on its technical aspects at that point. i put the pics on the computer and it was as i expected it would be.  i captured some of them, but the quality was not really there.  i tried adjusting contrast/removing color, etcetera, and it did help see some of the objects that couldn't be seen otherwise, but there is not great clarity. the entire scene lasted for approximately 4-5-6 minutes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Several small white orbs flying various directions, speeds and stopping abruptly, resuming speed, and large morphing silvery object descending slowly leaving trail

content.detailedDescription: Object was seen ne at 9:50pm, the object was hovering and changing colors. it was moving side to side and up and down, the object looked like something had come out of it and left the area. it took off after about 15-20 mins going nw and disappeared. my dog was also growling and whining and took off to the back bedroom. i did take photos, and there in there original form. it made me uneasy and freaked me right out.
content.summary: Colorful object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Was outside talking on telephone when ufo appeared above the tree line and shot a green beam of light out of three green other lights watch for i know the amount of time then object however directly above me for unknown amount of time
content.summary: Got very close to me about 10 ft then hovered

content.detailedDescription: Me,my wife and my son were all watching tv.We heard what sounded like a jet going by.It kept getting louder and louder,so we went out to see what it was.We all saw a giant aircraft of some sort that was a giant  boomerang or v shape.It was really loud and the lights on it were doing wierd patterns that i can't explain on here...I can only show you.At first we thought it was a jet crashing or a giant meteor,until we went and looked.It was going from south to north and moved pretty  slow until it went out of sight.We saw it for at least a minute.This all happened in southern new brunswick april 17 2014 at approx.9:30 pm.I posted online and asked if anyone else heard or saw anything and got a number of replies from different locations in town.Everyone heard it but never went outside and looked.I'm sure glad we did.
content.summary: Was loud,huge like a giant boomerang or v shape

content.detailedDescription: This thing really freaked me out the first time i saw it. i was alone, and sober, and it was bright like a whitish light,  silent, there was no sound at all coming from it, i was close enough to it that i could see the details of it.....It literally looked like a plastic bag air balloon, and thats what i thought it was, but it was breezy out, and a bag would have been erratically floating through the air. this was on a steady 5k/hr speed, straight line. i watched it fly over downtown peterborough towards the west end. it then got really bright like it caught on fire, and it was gone. i thought it was weird, but i forgot about it. then it happened again 2 weeks later, and this time it flew right over me as i was walking through a park in the same area i had previously saw it. it was really close again, and looked like a grocery bag...As it passed over me, silently, it imploded again and disappeared. this time i told a friend about it, cause i was really freaked out. she ended up seeing it with me one night when we were walking downtown near the water. it was heading west, as it always had been when i initially saw it. she thought it was super weird and it gave her a creepy feeling, same way it affected me. i saw it once more after that, but i was in a car, and i wasn't able to follow it. i checked our local weather to see if it could be a weather balloon or something, but there was no launches of material from them.
content.summary: I saw this bright looking fireball silently gliding across the sky, about 100 ft away from me, maybe 50-60ft off the ground. no sound at all...It moved silently then poof! looked like it burned up in flames and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were walking home in the afternoon. we saw an object that appeared to be oval or spherical flying in from the north. i told my son to run home and get his video camera. when he returned two additional objects were observed flying in, one from the east, and the other from the south. they converged and hovered for approximately 7 to 8 minutes before flying off in different directions. 

there was minimal clouds and the objects were clearly visible. there were no wings, or signs of propulsion. they were completely silent. the video was taken by my son, and he was obviously excited. also in the video a black spec can be seen which we later found to be a spec of dirt on the lens.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three objects flew in from different directions and then hovered for 7 to 8 mins before disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9-10pm on april 15th 2014 i was at the local park clearing my head and looking at the stars when i had noticed something in the sky,  n, nw - at a high altitude. initially i dismisseunbelievable i mean i  object as a plane as it had a bright white lead light...Then it changed toblue, then a silver blue, to red...Not unusual,  the plane must be banking i thought...But it remained to be stationary not moving from its position in the sky, so maybe it's a helicopter i think to myself..A very short time later (1-2) min later the object began to display characteristics in flight of a technology that does not exist on earth at least in the public eye - the craft looked as if it fell a few hundred feet in approximately 1-2 seconds then hovered changed colors, and began an erratic dance like flight pattern where it would rapidly descend hover head west stop on a dime and change direction back to the east, ascend very rapidly then drop below the tree line and even the roof line, and change direction like nothing on earth can - it looked as if a child playing with a toy airplane - it's movement was absolutely astonishing...I kept yelling "what the f is that!?"  then i noticed that another person was in the middle of the park looking on in disbelief and yelling just as i was i got their phone number just because this was so unbelievable as it took place not in the wee small hours of the morning, no but at about 10pm, and not in some rural area but in a major city over a heavily populated area.
-i was able to capture 2 pictures with my cell phone that i just noticed yesterday - the day after the event...See my brain blocked out the experience for a the better part of the day as this was so unbelievable,  i mean i watch these stories on tv, never thought i would be telling one let alone have captured pictures of the object.
-any how,  i have 2 pictures of the object. please examine them and let me know what i saw - was this someone with a rc helicopter..Or did i see something much more difficult to explain...I am not crazy, nor am i an attention whore,  just a very unsettled person who needs help understanding what he saw.

thank you for your attention
sincerely, 
chris mahackian
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I saw something that i cannot explain on 4/15/14. craft changed colors and manuvered like no known technology. caught 2 pictures, please examine and tell me what this is?!

content.detailedDescription: On april 16 i went to my back yard to observe the blood moon eclipse event. while observing, i noticed a strange craft fly overhead moving slowly, blacked out with no sound at all, from south to north towards mt taylor. it seemed to be about the size of a house, triangular in shape - altitude approx. 500 feet. no lights except the moon reflecting somewhat off of it. very strange! i'm still shaken! there's something weird going on out there!
content.summary: Triangular ufo observed in grants nm during "blood moon" eclipse event.

content.detailedDescription: My first of many experiences, more frequent the past few years or so. this was when i was about 4 years old, approx 3 am, i awoke in upstairs bedroom at my grandparents home. my bed faced a window on second floor and i don't know why i awaoke but there was a bright light in the room, glowing but not blinding. there were 3 other children sleeping in the room with me, as i looked around and sat up, everyone else was sound asleep and not moving. then outside as i looked through the window i saw orbs of light, red and green i remember clearly about the size of golf balls. they were moving in a circular rotation around eachohter, like orbiting i guess you could describ it and were moving towards the window of my room. i was confused and felt frightened but couldnt scream or cry, i looked for someone to wake up but nobody did.  the orbs of light continued to descend down and closer to the windown and cam e right thru the closed glass and into the room. they stopped and hovered, still rotating in the circular orbiting motion right about me. this experience lasted for a few minutes and then i have no memory. the next morning i didn't speak about it to anyone else. but i couldn't shake the experience, it did not feel like a dream at all. as i was in that same room playing on the floor with another child the window that they came thru the night before was closed and suddenly burst and shattered outwards. neither of us were even close to it, nothing was flung to break it and we sat astonished. we got blamed for breaking that window but to this day i know we did not. i did't tell anyone about what happened the night before. my next experience happened at about 8 to 10 years of age i believe. this time in a neighboring state, 3 entitites, i still can remember them vividly actually appeared in my bedroom in the middle of the night. one on each side of me and one behind me or towards my head. i could only see that on if i lifted my head backwards to see it. the others were one on each side and my bed i felt or maybe just me was raised up above the normal level of the bed. this was the only time i saw the beings, they did not look like the typical et's that are described with big eyes and strange shaped head, they weren't pretty at all and not human for sure. as time passed throughout my lifetime i have had multiple paranormal activity follow me and just recently i have seen crafts hovering and at times on a daily basis. i have been followed by these orbs and i am not crazy. i have time missing on several occassions or have woken with my clothes on backwards or no memory of how i got from one place to another. so much more to tell but this is all just not starting to affect me and i feel intuition and other strange things occuring to my body. the rest i will save to relay to an investigator is one would like to contact me. i would appreciate any reply or interest in what i have to say about this matter and the strange events that have followed me a lifetime.
content.summary: First encounter at about age 4, have had multiple thru life and several over last two years, all different, some similar.

content.detailedDescription:
My two young sons and i were driving west bound on beryl street in pacific beach, california in december 1989 about 3 hours before sundown. to my left, to the south, i noticed a falling bright ball of fire dropping straight down, directly over mission bay, perhaps 2 or no more than 3 miles as the crow flies from where we were driving. for a brief moment i thought it might have been a shooting star but it was too light for that. to my surprise, and frankly, my astonishment, it suddenly stopped in mid-air, i estimate not quite a thousand feet above the water.  as it did so, the "fire" seemed to collapse into itself, as if it was absorbed by the object. 
it then immediately emitted a bright "explosion" of light to reveal a dark, solid rectangular looking object that looked to be a little larger than a full size car, after which it hovered in the air for a few moments. 
it then began slowly moving horizontally in a north west direction. 
all of this happened inside of a span of perhaps 45 to 60 seconds.
i hurried home to get our video camera which took about 4 minutes 
from where we were. by the time i was ready to record it, 
it was no more than a dot in the western sky over the pacific.
i thought it was an extraordinary event but i never saw anything in 
the local paper about it or talked to anyone else who may have seen it.
content.summary: Falling "fireball", it stopped in mid-air, explosion of light, it hovered, then moved nw

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 5:45 pm on tuesday, april 15th 2014.... while making dinner for my family a very loud and vibrating noise got everyone's attention in the house. it lasted about 10-15 seconds. i yelled out to everyone, "what was that"? nobody knew. about 1 minute later the sound and vibrations returned. unable to free myself from the kitchen, i yelled for my daughter to go look. i looked out the small kitchen window and saw trees swaying. she didn't see anything so i rationalized it as strong gust of wind. until it came back again. about another minute or two later. this time i ran out on the front porch. i looked everywhere. at fist, i didn't see anything even though i could hear it. it had a deep sounding rumble that seemed to be coming from everywhere. i kept looking. the sound started to increase in pitch but was still very loud. this is when i saw it right above me. about the same height as a normal aircraft. it was egg/tear drop shaped. dark gray on the outer edge and got darker toward the center. it was fascinating. what i thought was strange was that it left no trail behind it. while it sounded loud, it seemed to easily move across the sky. it even tipped from right to left a bit. i yelled out for everyone to come look. my son was the only one who made it out to the porch while it was still visible. unfortunately, i couldn't get him to  look in the right direction which was very frustrating. the sound faded and it was gone. flew into a storm cloud over the mountains, which i also thought was strange. why would an aircraft knowingly fly into a storm cloud when it could have easily diverted. i was visibly excited. so much so, my heart was racing for at least an hour. it's been on my mind ever since. i have spent hours looking for answers online. looking for some kind of confirmation, be it ours or other worldly. as loud as it was, i have a hard time believing that i was the only one to go out to see what was causing the sound. please, please, please if anyone saw or heard it.... say something! i have tried to match the aircraft to known ones. nothing matched that reportedly exists, but it does have similar characteristics as the alleged aurora project. i don't think my mind will ever rest or my eyes ever stop looking to the sky until i get closure.
content.summary: Egg/teardrop shaped ufo makes rumbles house

content.detailedDescription: I looked out my second story kitchen window and saw the lights hovering over a church. i watched for a few seconds thinking they were a small plane but when they didn't move i ran out with my camcorder and they were gone.  i drove around to find higher ground to try to film them but couldn't find them.
content.summary: 3 orange lights, middle one was more red than the others.

content.detailedDescription:
at the time i saw this along with a good family friend, ------- (he rented a house next door to my aunt, -----------, just right up the road from us, we had become fast friends, went rock hounding together a lot), i was 16 years old, was living on the family farm.  we shared a party line with my aunt.  now my former younger brother (and his new wife), will not know about this event because they did not witness the event.

it was christmas eve, 1978.  it was not long before that christmas of 1978 which --------- wife had died of cancer, yet as long as he rented the old farmhouse from my aunt, he spent every christmas eve and christmas day with us, along with some thanksgivings and sometimes he stayed with us on easter.  i had received a new refracting telescope for that christmas from my parents, i had just installed the 12 mm lens into the focal tubing, and ron had stepped outside to smoke a cigarette.  there were many people inside my home for christmas, as it was for every christmas until christmas of 2005, which by that time most of the family members had passed away.   

anyway, ------- came running back into the house all excited, and yelled for me to get my new meade refracting telescope and bring it outside!  it was 8:00 pm, est.  when i got outside on the sidewalk, ------- pointed to the northwest, and by our viewpoint if you would imagine the height above the western tree line on the property the object was, plus factor in the distance away, it would have been roughly 12 feet above the western tree line.  unforunately, that western tree line along with much of the forest lands on the family farm were destroyed by hurricane hugo on september 22-23, 1989.   i saw what ------- was so excited about what we were witnessing to the northwest of us, there were absolutely no sounds to be heard, and whatever it was did not move that quickly as far as the naked eye was concerned.  i have heard dead silence many times, so quiet in fact even to hear the snow flakes land on the ground was deafening if you listened close enough.  even then while the snow was falling, with no sounds from any wildlife, cattle, goats, pigs, etc., it was not as quiet as it was that christmas eve of 1978 at 8:00 pm est.  to the naked eye, it appeared as a large yellowish-white circular ball of light, about the size of a ping-pong ball, that did not brighten up nor did it ever dim as it journeyed towards the southwestern skies over the ------------------ of ------------.

i had already set my telescope up outside on the sidewalk, with that 12 mm lens, and ------- was training the telescope in on it.  he was so excited, and then he grabbed my new christmas flannel shirt so i could view the object through my new meade telescope as well.  it was difficult for me to keep my telescope trained upon the ufo by this time because it had increased in speed as it journeyed from the northwestern skies towards the southwestern skies on that christmas eve of 1978.  what i saw through the eyepiece of the telescope was amazing.  the ufo was oblong in shape, brightly lit up, not in lights mind you, but it just glowed all over.  on the bottom of the ufo i clearly saw (and i have not ever forgotten this), there were 3 very distinctive black rectangular shaped markings, almost flared out on the ends to appear somewhat like a slightly stubby capital letter "i,"  which extended nearly all the way across the widest part of the bottom of the ufo.  what those markings represented, or whatever their function was with the operation of the ufo, neither ------- nor myself knew.  we both had saw the same thing, we both saw the same markings on the bottom of the oblong shaped ufo, and we both saw that it had no visible lights, instead the entire body of the ufo seem to glow brightly, as a lightning bug would glow when it flashes to attract a mate (unless it eaten by a bat or some other predator).  lightning bugs are themselves carnivorous, and it took a few years for me to figure that out as a child when i captured them inside a very large mason jar with grass inside thinking they ate plants; was i ever wrong.  i was a young child, and did not know lightning bugs were carnivorous.  

i kept trying to keep the ufo in view of my eyepiece with my new meade telescope, even with the 12 mm lens because that gave me the widest view possible while viewing through the telescope, but by now it had become impossible to keep up with it.  both ------- and i could not get over just how dead quiet everything was, and the object emitted no sounds what-so-ever.  i stood up, and looked at ------- after he told me to keep trying to track the ufo, and i had to tell him there was no way by that time i could keep up with it.  we both stood there for about 30 more seconds while watching the ufo continue towards the southwest, headed towards the ------------------ of -----------.  all at once the ufo gave off a very bright flash, and in what i have to admit was a 90 degree arching right hand angled rainbow, it sped off and disappeared into what i must admit was outer space.  ------- and i both just stood there looking to the southwest, we would look at each other, ----- eyes and facial expressions were full of excitement, as well mine, and then we both went running back into the house to tell everyone what we had just witnessed.  of course everyone laughed about it, but we were not teased about the encounter.  after that incident, every year since then just right before 8:00 pm est on christmas eve, weather permitting, while i lived in the ----------------------------, and ----------------------, areas, i would go outside and stand there looking towards the northwest and i would scan the skies all the way down through the southwest.  since i have moved from north carolina, to nebraska, i will also scan the northeastern to southeastern skies, weather permitting, starting at 7:00 pm cst.

i attended ------------------------- that previous 1977-1978 school year, the last year ----------------------------, and ---------------------, had a high school, and my professional life began not after i had graduated from south caldwell high school in 1980.  i went on to college at ------------------------- in august of 1980, and attended ------------------------- off and on until 1984 when i finished my major in forest management technology, but i also had earned several other certifications.  i worked part-time for the north carolina forest service on a part-time basis, usually when needed, from august of 1980 until december of 1993, my name stayed on their contact list when needed until that date.  my duties included: wildfire control anywhere in the continental united states, reforestation projects, some law enforcement, surveys of all kinds, some public relations, smoke spotter, and a smoke chaser, in other words i was a trained observer.  i had to be very observant of my surroundings, and to report accurately.  i was formally let go that december of 1993 because of massive north carolina state budget cuts.  

it was a good thing i always had my full-time truck driving jobs to fall back on which i started driving trucks in the summer of 1978, on my first real paying job while in high school.  i drove trucks during the other summers of 1979, 1980, during the spring and summer of 1981, spring and summer of 1982, winter-spring-summer of 1983, and i started driving trucks full-time in the late spring of 1984, after i had formally finished my college education at -------------------------, and i had received my associates in applied science degree in 1984, along with the other certifications i had earned along the way during those 4 years i had spent off and on at -------------------------.  

later in the spring of 1993, because of the new federal cdl regulations taking effect, and because the drivers license examiners told me i could get my cdl-a license for the same price as what it would have cost me to "grandfather" into a cdl-b license.  i went just down the highway from the n.C. drivers license bureau to -------------------------- and i inquired about the professional truck driving program.  i signed up for it, and i had to go get my cdl-a student drivers license the day before i graduated because my license allowed me to drive their big rigs as long as they were empty.  it was a big laugh between myself and the staff there at --------------------------.  i graduated on top of the class because to be honest truck driving had always came naturally to me.  i also earned several other certifications from -------------------------- during that spring course in 1993.  

overall, i have 24 years experience driving trucks, and i was also a professional truck driver instructor.  part of the job, you must be very aware of everything going on around you at all times because to be bluntly honest a 18 wheeler semi-truck is nothing more than 80,000 pounds of rolling death.  you will always lose if you try to tangle with a large 18 wheeled semi-truck, and no a 18 wheeler semi-truck does not have 18 brakes, it has 10 brakes.  two examples i will provide:  a fully loaded 18 wheeler will take about 100 yards at 55 mph to come to a complete stop without sliding it's tires.  a completely empty 18 wheeler will take about 105 yards to 110 yards at 55 mph to come to a complete stop.

a few years back, while i was married to my second wife, and i was watching a program about ufo's.  the program largely centered around sightings in brazil.  to my astonishment, one of the photos of a ufo was exactly like the one my friend, ------- and myself had witnessed that christmas eve in 1978.  i paused the satellite television program, i was so excited, and i was yelling excitedly for my wife to come into the living room.  i had backed the program up and let it play so that the program would show the picture of the ufo which i had seen back on christmas eve of 1978, so that my wife could see what i had told her about so many times regarding what ------- and i had seen that christmas eve of 1978, the only differences being this photo was snapped during the daytime, the ufo itself was not glowing, and you could clearly see the exact same shaped ufo, with it's bottom turned towards the photographer, with those exact same 3 rectangular shaped sort of stubby "i" shaped markings on the bottom of the ufo.  

well, i wanted you to know what i had seen that christmas eve of 1978.  every year on that time i go outside, weather permitting, and i will observe the northwestern to southwestern skies for any signs of movement.  now since i have moved from north carolina, to nebraska, i also observe the northeastern to southeastern skies on christmas eve, again weather permitting, starting at 7:00 pm cst.  

thank you for your time and allowing me to tell you my true story.  i also contacted ufo hunters with my story many years ago, but i received no response.  it would be nice if someone would take me seriously, understand i am a trained observer or at least was, and let me know something...Even if that someone can send me a photo of the ufo i had saw back on christmas eve of 1978, as well on the television program about ufo's some two decades ago while i had directv as my satellite television provider.  

sincerely yours, ------------
content.summary: Glowing ufo, silent running, across the nw to sw skies of western north carolina

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
What looked like two glowing red lights in the east turned out to be a square/rectagular object hovering very slowly east to west. it had 4 corners, one held a round green light, the opposite a red  (on each side of it's "wingspan") on the front and back it had white lights. it slowly hovered over me as i filmed it in the superstore parking lot at the west edge of the parking lot. it moved from one end of the lot at about 40 kph nearly silent except for a subtle static noise, and took maybe 20-30 seconds to pass over me. it then slowed, seemingly picked up speed and left, then returned within 20 seconds toward me. i subsequently drove my car away.


this happened at the west edge of london, somewhat north west of city center. it appeared as if the object cleared a final residential area pas the river, then turned and came back into town. 


the shapes between the four corners of light (from a direct underneath view) were composed of many straight lings, rectangular and square in nature--almost like 6" thick black rectangle and square walls with varying lengths overlapping each other but each side was almost always (if not always) parallel to the other (making them rectangles and squares). it appeared to be more long from far wing (north) to close wing (south facing wing) than it appeared to be from front (west moving) to back (east moving). the only close comparison would be an underside view of the millenium falcon from star wars, travelling sideways. it was non-symetrical and moved too slowly to be generating lift, and with not even enough sound to be a silent (stealth) helicopter. 

could be a weather balloon but it changed directions as viewable on film so fast and looked so obscure and indefinable i feel it's highly unlikely. my only other man made explanations are some kind of balloon/blimp device not commonly known (shape seen like what i saw in kitchener recently and in london recently the last 2 years i believe), a drone of some type, or a lowered hanging object dangled by a helicopter or drone of some type.   

at first the object appeared to be two red lights dimly glowing and hovering stationary, however it was at such a distance the lights were barely visible.
content.summary: Changing light colors, object speed, turns/changed direction at west edge of london, proceeding back toward my position before i drive off.

content.detailedDescription: One summer night i was about 8 or 9 years old we were coming home to new jersey from my grandmothers traveling south on rt 94. as we passed by the stretch of highway that has a cattle farm on both sides we noticed traffic was going slow almost at a stand down. i was riding in the front set with my mom. as we got closer we noticed three lights in the sky. it was a green a red and a white light. the sky was clear. as we got just about under it we could see a dark triangler shape and each of those lights was in a corner. it hovered and just slowly rotated making no noise. where we were on the road we were about 5 miles from a hospital and a heavily populated and active town. we just slowly moved along watching it as we passed under it and got further down the road. and looking out the back window you could see it in the distance as we kept driving home. my mother and i told my father and he looked at us funny. we always told people but the looked at us like we were crazy. so me and my mother kept it to ourselves. we saw your report on hudson valley and maybe thought it might have some relation. to this day i remember the exact spot where i saw it. it was almost like you reach out and touch it. my mother and i have always been told we are nuts. but we are just looking for some answers to this. it was that it scared us it just seemed really odd and to this day not something we can explain.
content.summary: Hovering above a busy highway at night

content.detailedDescription: I am a truck driver. i completed a delivery in fairless hills pennsylvania. i was driving highway 76 eastbound and i noticed a brite white light. it appeared to be stationary so i grabbed my phone as quick as i could and took pictures while i was driving. i lost sight because i had to keep my eyes on the road. when i checked my photos i couldn't believe i caught what looks like ufos' exiting a portal. i didn't want to come forward to media because i didn't want people to think i was crazy. i recently saw simular images on youtube titled " ufo captured over the gold coast of australia " and " ufo caught on webcam " i also saw something on tv about the 2008 ufo sightings in stevenville texas. the images that they showed and described looked like the picture i took. the picture is 100 percent real and was taken with my cricket android phone. you can examine the photo. i am open to a phone call but i do not want to be on tv. i would like to know that you received my info. call or email me
content.summary: White portal with ufos' exiting. simular to ufos' captured on webcam over the gold coast of australia
